scripts.say: This should be enough for us to get away... Ardent, Acasta, change course and cover our escape! We're retreating!
Admittedly, I let my guard down, but that was a fine battle! Miss, uh... Admiral Hipper, may we meet again one day!
Y-you're running away?! Dammit, this means more chasing for me... This isn't over, you hear!
